snippet: The administration has begun helping Middle Eastern allies build their defenses against Iran’s cyberweapons and will do the same in Asia to contain attacks from North Korea.
abstract: Obama administration is helping Middle Eastern allies build up their defenses against Iran's growing arsenal of cyberweapons; intends to do likewise in Asia to contain computer-network attacks from North Korea; Defense Department's assertive new effort is latest example of how Obama administration is increasingly tailoring its national security efforts for new era of digital conflict.

byline.original: By THOM SHANKER and DAVID E. SANGER

lead_paragraph: The administration has begun helping Middle Eastern allies build their defenses against Iran’s cyberweapons and will do the same in Asia to contain attacks from North Korea.

headline.seo: U.S. Helps Allies Trying to Battle Iranian Hackers
headline.main: U.S. Helps Allies Trying to Battle Iranian Hackers
headline.print_headline: U.S. Helps Allies Trying to Battle Iranian Hackers

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
